feature.name: desc_dma
feature.doc: Descriptor DMA aggregation and async commit to HW.

numeric.name: dma_desc_aggregator_chain_length_max
numeric.doc: Maximal number of descriptors in a single chain.

numeric.name: dma_desc_aggregator_buff_size_kb
numeric.doc: Total size in KB of dmmable memory allocated in favor of the descriptor DMA double-buffer.

numeric.name: dma_desc_aggregator_timeout_usec
numeric.doc: Timeout between the creation of a descriptor chain and its commit to HW

value.name: enable
value.doc: Enable descriptor DMA for the given module.
